problem.markdown:
>>What percent of the human population lives in the developing world? Express your answer in whole numbers. Do not add the % sign.<<
= 83 +- 3
[explanation] There are currently 6 billion people in the developing world is 6 billion / 7.2 billion = 83% [explanation]
problem.p: What percent of the human population lives in the developing world? Express your answer in whole numbers. Do not add the % sign.

formulaequationinput.label: What percent of the human population lives in the developing world? Express your answer in whole numbers. Do not add the % sign.

div.p: There are currently 6 billion people in the developing world is 6 billion / 7.2 billion = 83%
